subject: Create team strategies reference document
description:
Create a new reference document at `plugins/sdd/skills/execute-tasks/references/team-strategies.md` that defines all 4 team strategies for the execute-tasks workflow.

This is the foundational document that all other team-related changes depend on. Follow the format and conventions of existing reference docs (`orchestration.md`, `execution-workflow.md`).

**Strategy Sections to Define:**

For each strategy (Solo, Review, Research, Full), document:
- Agent roles and responsibilities
- Spawn configuration (model tiers, tools available per role)
- Coordination flow (sequential steps within team)
- Lifecycle steps (create → spawn → coordinate → collect → cleanup)
- Session file format (what gets written to `team_activity_task-{id}.md`)
- Degradation target (what strategy to fall back to on failure)

**Strategy Definitions:**

1. **Solo** — Existing behavior: single task-executor agent per task (no team created)
2. **Review** — Two agents: implementer (writes code) + reviewer (independently verifies). Sequential: implement → review
3. **Research** — Two agents: explorer (investigates codebase/requirements) + implementer (uses findings). Sequential: explore → implement
4. **Full** — Three agents: explorer + implementer + reviewer pipeline. Sequential: explore → implement → review

**Reference Implementations:**
- Adapt patterns from `plugins/tools/skills/teams-deep-analysis/SKILL.md` (hub-and-spoke coordination)
- Adapt agent patterns from `plugins/tools/agents/team-code-explorer.md` and `team-deep-synthesizer.md`

**Include:**
- `team_activity.md` file format specification (regex-parseable, consistent with `progress.md` patterns)
- Agent role matrix (which tools each role gets)
- Team naming convention: `task-team-{task-id}-{timestamp}`
- Model tier recommendations per role

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] All 4 strategies are fully defined with required sections
- [ ] File format is consistent with existing reference docs
- [ ] `team_activity.md` format is specified and regex-parseable
- [ ] Agent role matrix clearly defines tools per role

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] Solo strategy explicitly states "no team created, existing behavior"
- [ ] Degradation targets documented for each non-solo strategy

_Error Handling:_
- [ ] Strategy-specific failure handling rules documented
- [ ] Partial team failure scenarios addressed (e.g., reviewer fails but implementer succeeded)

**Testing Requirements:**
- Manual: Verify document is comprehensive and follows existing reference doc patterns
- Manual: Verify `team_activity.md` format can be parsed by regex

Source: internal/specs/agent-teams-updates-SPEC.md Sections 5.1, 5.8
